settings.title: The legendary team at Butter are kicking off their launch on ChefPrep in style with a Golden Ticket competition!
settings.text:
Rrunning until Nov 28, three Golden Tickets will be randomly placed into the delivery boxes of customers who have ordered a Butter product from ChefPrep (one ticket per week). 

Each Golden Ticket has a value of $100 and can be redeemed at any of the three Butter Sydney stores across Butter's range of products.
